rows.label: tlk47100061_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Because the scary Demon Lord is gone, Pepe
and I came to eat grass! The grass in
Iyasaki Village is the most delicious!

rows.label: tlk47100061_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Thank you, true hero-sama,
for helping Mimi and Pepe.

rows.label: tlk47100061_02_msg0003
rows.name:
When your adventure is all over,
let's eat grass together here!
Pepe and I will be waiting!
